articles.title: Supabase is SOC2 compliant
articles.description: Supabase is now SOC2 Type 1 compliant. Let’s dig into what that means, and explain the process we went through to get there. If you’re building a SaaS product, this blog post should provide a rough guide to getting your SOC2 certification.
